parameters.name: seed

param_schema.title: Seed
param_schema.description: Random seed which can be used to reproduce results.

parameters.description: Random seed which can be used to reproduce results.

parameters.name: text
parameters.default: The expressiveness of autoregressive transformers is literally nuts! I absolutely adore them.

param_schema.title: Text
param_schema.default: The expressiveness of autoregressive transformers is literally nuts! I absolutely adore them.

parameters.name: preset

param_schema.description: Which voice preset to use. See the documentation for more information.

parameters.description: Which voice preset to use. See the documentation for more information.

parameters.name: voice_a

param_schema.description: Selects the voice to use for generation. Use `random` to select a random voice. Use `custom_voice` to use a custom voice.

parameters.description: Selects the voice to use for generation. Use `random` to select a random voice. Use `custom_voice` to use a custom voice.

parameters.name: voice_b

param_schema.description: (Optional) Create new voice from averaging the latents for `voice_a`, `voice_b` and `voice_c`. Use `disabled` to disable voice mixing.

parameters.description: (Optional) Create new voice from averaging the latents for `voice_a`, `voice_b` and `voice_c`. Use `disabled` to disable voice mixing.

parameters.name: voice_c

param_schema.description: (Optional) Create new voice from averaging the latents for `voice_a`, `voice_b` and `voice_c`. Use `disabled` to disable voice mixing.

parameters.description: (Optional) Create new voice from averaging the latents for `voice_a`, `voice_b` and `voice_c`. Use `disabled` to disable voice mixing.

parameters.name: cvvp_amount

param_schema.title: Cvvp Amount
param_schema.description: How much the CVVP model should influence the output. Increasing this can in some cases reduce the likelyhood of multiple speakers. Defaults to 0 (disabled)

parameters.description: How much the CVVP model should influence the output. Increasing this can in some cases reduce the likelyhood of multiple speakers. Defaults to 0 (disabled)

parameters.name: custom_voice

param_schema.title: Custom Voice
param_schema.description: (Optional) Create a custom voice based on an mp3 file of a speaker. Audio should be at least 15 seconds, only contain one speaker, and be in mp3 format. Overrides the `voice_a` input.

parameters.description: (Optional) Create a custom voice based on an mp3 file of a speaker. Audio should be at least 15 seconds, only contain one speaker, and be in mp3 format. Overrides the `voice_a` input.

seed.title: Seed
seed.description: Random seed which can be used to reproduce results.

text.title: Text
text.default: The expressiveness of autoregressive transformers is literally nuts! I absolutely adore them.

preset.description: Which voice preset to use. See the documentation for more information.

voice_a.description: Selects the voice to use for generation. Use `random` to select a random voice. Use `custom_voice` to use a custom voice.

voice_b.description: (Optional) Create new voice from averaging the latents for `voice_a`, `voice_b` and `voice_c`. Use `disabled` to disable voice mixing.

voice_c.description: (Optional) Create new voice from averaging the latents for `voice_a`, `voice_b` and `voice_c`. Use `disabled` to disable voice mixing.

cvvp_amount.title: Cvvp Amount
cvvp_amount.description: How much the CVVP model should influence the output. Increasing this can in some cases reduce the likelyhood of multiple speakers. Defaults to 0 (disabled)

custom_voice.title: Custom Voice
custom_voice.description: (Optional) Create a custom voice based on an mp3 file of a speaker. Audio should be at least 15 seconds, only contain one speaker, and be in mp3 format. Overrides the `voice_a` input.

Request.description: The request body for a prediction
